description: This module is used to configure PoolGroup object

username.description: Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

tenant_uuid.description: UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

cloud_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type cloud.

min_servers.description: The minimum number of servers to distribute traffic to.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

state.description: The state that should be applied on the entity.

created_by.description: Name of the user who created the object.

name.description: The name of the pool group.

url.description: Avi controller URL of the object.

controller.description: IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

cloud_config_cksum.description: Checksum of cloud configuration for poolgroup.

api_version.description: Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

members.description: List of pool group members object of type poolgroupmember.

fail_action.description: Enable an action - close connection, http redirect, or local http response - when a pool group failure happens.

password.description: Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

deployment_policy_ref.description: When setup autoscale manager will automatically promote new pools into production when deployment goals are met.

tenant.description: Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
